description: Enterprise techniques used by DDKONG, ATT&CK software S0255 v1.0
name: DDKONG (S0255)

techniques.comment: [DDKONG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0255) decodes an embedded configuration using XOR.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[DDKONG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0255) lists files on the victim’s machine.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[DDKONG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0255) downloads and uploads files on the victim’s machine.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[DDKONG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0255) uses Rundll32 to ensure only a single instance of itself is running at once.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
